name: Research Technician Formulations
desc:
Our World faces enormous challenges and risks that currently have no comprehensive, effective, or simple solution: 

Equitable access to healthcare, food, and clean water
Ability to respond to global pandemics
Control of agricultural pests and disease vectors that have become resistant to traditional chemical pesticides.
These represent a small subset of what must be achieved to ensure global sustainable development. RNA has been shown to be a safe, ecologically-friendly, highly specific means to address these problems. However, the high cost of RNA production prohibits its widespread use.

GreenLight has developed a scalable process for the low-cost production of RNA, and is designing products to address many of these issues in an economical, sustainable, environmentally friendly, and highly specific manner.

We also believe in the power of data science and machine learning to make car insurance better and less complicated. 

By using our deep understanding of data and building services that make having a car less expensive, more convenient, and smarter, we aim to make the urban car experience truly simple. And for some, we hope to make car ownership a possibility where it wasn’t before. 

Metromile has raised approximately $291 million in funding (Series A through E) and are backed by top tier Silicon Valley Investors including NEA, Index and First Round Capital.

We want clients to be able to automatically deposit their paycheck into their Wealthfront account, and let us take care of the rest — paying their bills, topping off their emergency fund or 401(k), and investing the rest based on their specific goals and lifestyle. name: Research Associate, Cell Biology
desc:
Reaction Biology Corp. (“RBC”) is a premier service provider for drug profiling, screening and early-stage drug discovery collaborations.   Its proprietary HotSpot technology is an innovative platform for screening/profiling small molecules vs biological target assayable by radioisotope detection.  For kinase and transferase enzymes in particular, such assays are the “gold standard”.

RBC screens and profiles vs all major classes of epigenetic transferases via the radioisotope approach—HMTs, DNMTs, HATs, and also over 600 kinases.   HotSpot assay substrates require no special modifications (e.g. biotin, fluorophors or other tags).  Hence biologically relevant substrates may be used, including full nucleosomes, histone proteins or peptides.  Since detection does not rely on antibodies, coupling enzymes or fluorescence, major causes of false positives, false negatives and compound interference are eliminated.

name: (Contract) Research Associate, Drug Product Analytical Development
desc:
At Moderna, we believe messenger RNA, or mRNA, is the “software of life.”  
Every cell in the body uses mRNA to provide real-time instructions to make the proteins necessary to drive all aspects of biology, including in human health and disease.  Given its essential role, we believe mRNA could be used to create a new category of medicines with significant potential to improve the lives of patients.

We are pioneering a new class of medicines made of messenger RNA, or mRNA. The potential implications of using mRNA as a drug are significant and far-reaching and could meaningfully improve how medicines are discovered, developed and manufactured. 

Since our founding in 2010, we have worked to build the industry's leading mRNA technology platform, the infrastructure to accelerate drug discovery and early development, a rapidly expanding pipeline, and a world-class team. Our pipeline includes development candidates for mRNA-based vaccines and therapies spanning several therapeutic areas, and we have multiple clinical trials underway with other development candidates progressing toward the clinic. In addition, we have numerous discovery programs advancing toward development.

name: Project Manager- Fremont CA
desc:
Around the globe, Veolia helps cities and industries to manage, optimize and make the most of their resources. The company provides an array of solutions related to water, energy and materials – with a focus on waste recovery – to promote the transition toward a circular economy.

To this end, the company designs and deploys specialist solutions to provide, protect and replenish resources while increasing their efficiency from an environmental, economic and social standpoint. Such initiatives are all part of Veolia's ongoing campaign to resource the world.

name: Performance Engineer
desc:
As a team member here, you’re empowered to discover and deliver solutions that make life radically simple. Whether you’re helping our clients navigate the complicated home buying process or developing the latest game-changing financial products, you join an organization that is changing the face of lending – just as we have for more than 30 years.

	What started simply as a summer experiment for our founder and chairman Dan Gilbert has become America’s largest mortgage lender,1 with offices in Detroit, Cleveland, Phoenix, Charlotte and more. Today, more than 17,000 team members work for our suite of fintech services. Together with nearly 100 brands across a broad range of industries, from real estate to sports, we make up the Rock Family of Companies – all united by an obsession to find a better way for our clients, our team members and our communities.

	We say that we’re obsessed, but it’s more than that – it’s our purpose and guiding light. Finding a better way is the only way. The results speak for themselves:

•	We were the first lender to bring the entire mortgage process online.
•	For 9 years in a row now, J.D. Power has ranked Quicken Loans highest in the nation in customer satisfaction for Primary Mortgage Origination. And for the sixth year in a row, they also ranked us highest for Mortgage Servicing.
•	We build advanced technology that improves our clients’ lives, including voice assistant integrations that make it possible to pay your mortgage simply using your voice.

This success wouldn’t be possible without our team members. It’s because of their drive and determination that we’ve made the top-30 of FORTUNE magazine’s annual ranking of the 100 Best Companies to Work For list for 15 consecutive years. But awards can’t replace great ideas. That’s why we’re committed to an inclusive workplace, where every voice is heard and all our team members have access and opportunity to grow their skills and become the best versions of themselves.

That mission extends out beyond our walls and right into our communities, where we don’t just volunteer but also invest our unique efforts in ways that impact the world around us. 

We’ve revolutionized the mortgage industry, but this is about more than mortgages. This is about changing people’s lives. Join our team and change your own life today.


Based on Quicken Loans data in comparison to public data records.

For J.D. Power award information, visit JDPower.com.

name: Software Engineer - Camera
desc:
We’re looking for inventive minds to help fuel what’s next in 5G.

Qualcomm is the wireless technology innovator and the company of inventors that unlocked 5G. We’re ushering in an age of rapid acceleration in wireless connectivity that’s transforming entire industries and enriching lives on a global scale. From smartphones to smart homes, mobile PCs to automotive, gaming to XR/VR/AR, and audio to factories of the future, 5G may be the most important technological development of the 21 st century — and Qualcomm is leading the way. 

But this is just the beginning. It takes brilliant minds with diverse skills, backgrounds, and cultures to transform 5G’s potential into world-changing technologies and products. This is the Invention Age — and this is where you come in.

name: Senior Product Manager
desc:
We were founded on the simple yet revolutionary idea that when people are free to work from anywhere, at any time, what they can accomplish is only limited by their imaginations. 

Today, we’re still reimagining how the world works. We securely deliver the apps and data millions of people rely on. We engineer award-winning technology. We cultivate meaningful partnerships with our customers to understand and anticipate their unique needs. And we envision real-world uses for cutting-edge technology so customers can stay ahead.

name: Data Scientist
desc:
Our World faces enormous challenges and risks that currently have no comprehensive, effective, or simple solution: 

Equitable access to healthcare, food, and clean water
Ability to respond to global pandemics
Control of agricultural pests and disease vectors that have become resistant to traditional chemical pesticides.
These represent a small subset of what must be achieved to ensure global sustainable development. RNA has been shown to be a safe, ecologically-friendly, highly specific means to address these problems. However, the high cost of RNA production prohibits its widespread use.

GreenLight has developed a scalable process for the low-cost production of RNA, and is designing products to address many of these issues in an economical, sustainable, environmentally friendly, and highly specific manner.

name: Software Quality Engineer
desc:
As a team member here, you’re empowered to discover and deliver solutions that make life radically simple. Whether you’re helping our clients navigate the complicated home buying process or developing the latest game-changing financial products, you join an organization that is changing the face of lending – just as we have for more than 30 years.

	What started simply as a summer experiment for our founder and chairman Dan Gilbert has become America’s largest mortgage lender,1 with offices in Detroit, Cleveland, Phoenix, Charlotte and more. Today, more than 17,000 team members work for our suite of fintech services. Together with nearly 100 brands across a broad range of industries, from real estate to sports, we make up the Rock Family of Companies – all united by an obsession to find a better way for our clients, our team members and our communities.

	We say that we’re obsessed, but it’s more than that – it’s our purpose and guiding light. Finding a better way is the only way. The results speak for themselves:

•	We were the first lender to bring the entire mortgage process online.
•	For 9 years in a row now, J.D. Power has ranked Quicken Loans highest in the nation in customer satisfaction for Primary Mortgage Origination. And for the sixth year in a row, they also ranked us highest for Mortgage Servicing.
•	We build advanced technology that improves our clients’ lives, including voice assistant integrations that make it possible to pay your mortgage simply using your voice.

This success wouldn’t be possible without our team members. It’s because of their drive and determination that we’ve made the top-30 of FORTUNE magazine’s annual ranking of the 100 Best Companies to Work For list for 15 consecutive years. But awards can’t replace great ideas. That’s why we’re committed to an inclusive workplace, where every voice is heard and all our team members have access and opportunity to grow their skills and become the best versions of themselves.

That mission extends out beyond our walls and right into our communities, where we don’t just volunteer but also invest our unique efforts in ways that impact the world around us. 

We’ve revolutionized the mortgage industry, but this is about more than mortgages. This is about changing people’s lives. Join our team and change your own life today.


Based on Quicken Loans data in comparison to public data records.

For J.D. Power award information, visit JDPower.com.

name: Global Product Marketing Manager, Global Financial Markets
desc:
CSC® is the world's leading provider of business, legal, tax, and digital brand services to companies around the globe. From keeping businesses in compliance and streamlining operations, to protecting and promoting brands online, we use our expertise and personal approach to help businesses run smoother.

We are the business behind business®.

CSC now has more than 2,500 employees worldwide and serves the world’s largest corporations, law firms, and financial institutions. We offer the most unique range of solutions in our industry, and have been in business nearly 120 years.

name: Data Analyst
desc: Veritone (NASDAQ: VERI) has created the world’s first operating system for artificial intelligence. Veritone’s aiWARE operating system unlocks the power of cognitive computing to transform and analyze audio, video and other data sources in an automated manner to generate accurate, actionable insights easily and quickly. With Veritone, organizations gain a future-proof investment in AI solutions. aiWARE offers a marketplace for trusted AI, powered by a diverse global partner ecosystem of cognitive engine developers, application developers, and system integrators. Veritone has been recognized by AWS for Machine Learning Expertise and by Oracle for Excellence in Application Development.

name: Applications Scientist
desc:
SWM is a global manufacturing expert, started in 1545 in France, producing highly engineered materials like specialty paper, nets and films from fibers, resins and polymers that are used every day in products and markets around the world. In fact, you have probably used an SWM product without even knowing it!

▪  3,500+ employees world-wide

▪  Over 20 locations on 4 continents

▪  Leading products in multiple industries

▪  A legacy of operational excellence and financial strength

name: Data Analyst
desc:
Founded in 1946, UFG offers insurance protection for people’s businesses, homes, vehicles and lives, including:

-Business insurance
-Commercial insurance
-Surety bonds
-Individual insurance

Our products are available exclusively through a select group of approximately 1,200 independent property and casualty insurance agents across the country, directly serving the insurance needs of people in their communities.

With a UFG workforce of over 1,100 employees — working at our corporate headquarters in Cedar Rapids, Iowa, and five regional offices in Westminster, Colorado; Webster, Texas; Pennington, New Jersey; Los Angeles, California; Rocklin, California; and Phoenix, Arizona — we can be depended on to deliver exceptional protection and service to our thousands of policyholders in every region of the U.S.

name: SYSPRO Senior Consultants
desc:
BT Partners is a full service technology consulting firm with over 25 years’ leading experience in serving the SMB (small-medium business) market.  BT Partners’ services include:

Business Software: sale, implementation, training and support of ERP (SYSPRO™, Rootstock™), Financial Management (Intacct™), and Business Management (DOMO™) software solutions.

Performance Improvement: Business Process Re-engineering, Software Selection,  ERP Optimization, KPIs and Business Analytics

IT Management: Network & Infrastructure Managed Services, Helpdesk and Support, IT Strategy, Implementation Management, Custom Application Development

name: Senior Semiconductor Research Engineer
desc:
SAGE Electrochromics develops smart, green window technologies to dramatically improve the human experience in the built environment - buildings and homes.   Our technology darkens or lightens architectural or transportation glass with the push of a button, or a swipe of your app screen.  SAGEGlass unleashes the architect to design freely with glass - eliminating unwanted glare and solar heat gain.  Transforming living and working conditions.  People are more comfortable.  More productive.  Buildings use less energy - a lot less energy!  

SageGlass is the innovation leader in this space, constantly improving our disruptive technology.  We hold almost 600 granted patents, running fast to stay ahead of  the Silicon Valley followers.  It's a great race, but the world is a healthier, greener place because of it.  We are a respectful, collaborative, engaging workplace, and we are always looking for people who want more than a job - we need people who want to make a difference with their lives.

name: Project Engineer
desc: Conventional milk cartons are an unbreakable improvement over glass milk bottles, but the introduction of the Tetra Pak aseptic beverage container in the late 1950's was revolutionary for the food and beverage industries. Tetra Pak -- which takes its name from the original tetrahedron-shaped cartons it developed -- manufactures and markets food packaging containers, filling systems, and distribution equipment for industrial customers in more than 170 countries. Its coated-paperboard boxes are used to hold dry, wet, cold, and shelf-stable foods and beverages. The privately-owned company is the largest subsidiary of holding company Tetra Laval International.

name: Data Scientist
desc:
Since 1932, Southern New Hampshire University has challenged the status quo of higher education. We’re in the “business of hope,” because we serve students for whom education is not a guarantee – from working parents and military service members to refugees and beyond. 

We succeed because we are more than an institution – we’re a community of passionate people rallied around a mission to make the world better. We empower our staff with competitive salary and benefits, a collaborative culture and top-tier programs for professional growth. Because we believe that an opportunity can change everything. And now’s the time.

name: V&V Test Engineer (Software)
desc:
At IQ Inc. we are proud to impact the quality of life through technology.  We work with our clients on various projects to help people in meaningful industries with customized solutions for our customers.  Since its founding in 1994, IQ Inc. has delivered custom, quality software development, testing, and consulting services to businesses big and small in the Greater Pittsburgh area.  From concept through analysis and prototyping, to delivering a complete solution, IQ Inc. engages the right people, the right technology, and the right process.  

Our IQ Inc. culture is inclusive and dynamic.  We actively seek employee and manager input to help improve policies and procedures while maintaining strong leadership.

name: Senior Software Engineer (Clearance Required)
desc:
Collaboration is the fusion of people and ideas toward a common goal; and at CollabraSpace it’s part of everything we do.  It's the foundation upon which CollabraSpace was created, at the core of our corporate philosophy, and even represented in our logo where different pieces of one circle work together. As a technical services and product company, we support the critical mission of our nation’s security through ongoing collaboration with our team members, clients, and partners.

Across our 25+ programs we provide enterprise software development solutions and real-time collaboration to both government and private industry.  Our HQ is in Annapolis Junction, MD, close to the majority of our work and therefore, close to you.   

We truly believe in the team.  We’ll always do our best to find a position that makes you happy to go to work, support the charitable causes that are important to you, and encourage your involvement with the company by providing events for the whole family.

name: Construction Project Manager, Light Industrial/ Manufacturing
desc: The Graycor family of companies is a leading provider of construction, maintenance and facilities services throughout the U.S., Canada, and Mexico. We offer clients in a variety of industrial and commercial markets the strength and experience needed to tackle the most sophisticated jobs and the flexibility to meet their toughest challenges. We employ more than 1,600 construction specialists at our headquarters in Oakbrook Terrace, IL, regional offices and project sites throughout North America. We are a privately held, family owned business that operates within a set of core values that frame our strategy and culture. Our values provide our people with standards of behavior necessary to maintain and enhance our reputation. Without attempting to rank them, we can say that our actions are consistent with these values: Long Term Perspective, Integrity and Honesty, Health & Safety, Relationships, Value, Continuous Improvement, and Family.

name: Manager Software Engineering - Data Platform
desc: Whether you’re looking to reach more customers, sell more products, or simply share your passion with the world, Constant Contact has all the tools, features, and expert guidance you need to get online — and grow online — all in one place.

name: Sr. Project Manager, (non-IT) Provider Contracting - Medicare
desc:
CareFirst BlueCross BlueShield is the largest health care insurer in the Mid-Atlantic region, serving nearly 3.2 million members in the Maryland, District of Columbia, and Northern Virginia area. Every day, we help people make decisions that will positively impact their lives today and into the future. You can take your experience to the next level in a company that is financially strong, nationally respected and named by the Ethisphere Institute as one of the “World’s Most Ethical Companies” for seven consecutive years.

Here, you will become part of a company that is changing the face of healthcare.

name: Project Manager
desc: Experian is the leading global information services company, providing data and analytical tools to our clients around the world.  Data has the potential to transform lives and create a better tomorrow. We are transforming data into something meaningful:  helping businesses to manage credit risk, preventing fraud, targeting marketing offers and automating decision making.  We have been named one of the “World’s Most Innovative Companies” by Forbes for 3 years in a row.  Experian has operated at the center of Big Data since before the phrase was coined. Few companies can offer information services on an equivalent scale.  Experian is a constituent of the United Kingdom's FTSE 100 index, with total revenue for the year ended March 31, 2016, of US $4.6 billion. We support clients in more than 80 countries and employ approximately 17,000 people in 37 countries.

name: Product Manager
desc:
What makes a great career? If you ask us, we’ll tell you that it’s the experience, the people and the sense of pride that comes from delivering what people want and need from the digital world.   

Verizon powers America’s fastest and most reliable network. We’re also leading the way in cloud and security solutions, Internet of Things and video entertainment.  

Technology moves fast and so do we. We continuously innovate and learn from the best. We believe that bringing great ideas and customer experiences to life should be recognized and rewarded. Our work perks include competitive pay, health and wellness benefits, tuition assistance and more. You’ll find adventure in one of our many global offices, located in 150 countries and 2,700 cities. 

Whether you think in code, words, pictures or numbers, find your future at Verizon.

name: Technical Product Manager II (CMS-DAM)
desc: Sallie Mae is proud to help Americans aspiring to create the life they want—whether that means helping them make college happen, or something more. Our colleagues across departments and across the country are united in our passion and our customer-first approach. Whether you want to join a growing company, be part of an agile workforce, or gain new skills—you’re in the right place.

name: Embedded Software Engineer II in Test
desc: Electric Boat (EB) is a business unit of General Dynamics with headquarters in Groton, CT. Electric Boat is one of the world’s premier submarine builders.

name: Data Scientist
desc:
Press Ganey pioneered the health care performance improvement movement more than 30 years ago, and continues to be recognized as a leading innovator in the field. Since the company’s founding in 1985, Press Ganey has expanded its suite of solutions, strategic advisory services and scope beyond inpatient settings to advance the visionary work and intense passion of its co-founders, Dr. Irwin Press and Dr. Rod Ganey, whose mission to help improve health care.

Three decades later, we are still transforming the way health care is delivered. We partner with more than 33,000 health care facilities to provide meaningful measurement and actionable insights at the multiple points of intersection between safety, clinical excellence, patient experience and workforce engagement. Today, our integrated suite of solutions is delivered through a cutting-edge digital platform, built on a foundation of data security, which enables enterprise transformation across the continuum of care.

name: Senior Software Engineer - SF / San Jose
desc: At TrueAccord, we believe everyone deserves to be treated with respect, especially during the debt collections process. We strive to de-stigmatize debt collection by engaging with each customer by offering personalized options. We work with enterprises, small businesses and companies new to collections to recover billions in lost revenue.

name: Project Manager
desc:
We provide superior-quality high-tech products and services ethically, responsively, and cost-effectively to the national security, satellite, launch, automotive, cybersecurity, and critical infrastructure sectors.

Our solutions require specialized expertise, complex technologies, highest quality, and low-volume design, development, testing, manufacturing, and operational capabilities – all delivered quickly and affordably.

name: Data Scientist
desc:
Genworth Financial, Inc. (NYSE: GNW) is a leading Fortune 500® insurance holding company dedicated to helping people secure their financial lives, families and futures. Genworth has leadership positions in products and services that assist consumers in protecting themselves, investing for the future and planning for retirement -- including life insurance, long term care insurance, financial protection coverages, and independent advisor-based wealth management -- and mortgage insurance that helps consumers achieve home ownership while assisting lenders in managing their risk and capital.

Our products and services are offered through financial intermediaries, advisors, independent distributors and sales specialists. Headquartered in Richmond, Virginia, Genworth traces its roots back to 1871 and became a public company in 2004.

name: Analytics Consultant
desc: ​​​​​​​Nashville General Hospital (NGH) is Nashville’s original community- based hospital.  Joint Commission accredited, NGH readily accommodates a wide range of needs from emergency services and acute care to ancillary and ambulatory services. NGH continues to maintain its strong commitment to the healthcare needs of Nashville and Davidson County underserved, while also providing care to all segments of the community.

name: Sr. Director, Sr. Product Manager
desc: Priority Payment Systems: Priority Payment Systems LLC is one of the fastest growing payment technology companies in the U.S. We were founded in 2005 with a mission to build a merchant inspired payment platform that would advance the goals of our small and mid-sized business partners. We're headquartered in Alpharetta GA, have more than 174,000 merchants and process more than 39 billion electronic transactions annually. Our national network of talented ISOs and agents has been a big part of our rapid growth and success.

name: Data Engineer II
desc: We are the dominant auto parts retailer in all of our market areas. From our roots as a single store in 1957 to our current size of 5,219 locations (and growing), we've come a long way. We continue to be one of the fastest-growing companies in the industry with countless opportunities for individual growth. Whether you are looking to run a store, manage a distribution center, or climb the corporate ladder, O'Reilly has the career path for you!

name: Business Analyst
desc:
In 1980, after recognizing a local need for a shipping supply distributor, Liz and Dick Uihlein started Uline from their basement. Their first product was the H-101 carton sizer (still offered today). It sold far beyond their expectations and encouraged the Uihleins to add more products to the catalog.

Uline has steadily grown and continues to be a family owned and run business. The product line has expanded to include industrial, packaging, shipping, material handling, retail and janitorial supplies, including over 1,550 shipping box sizes alone. The 788-page Uline catalog reaches businesses nationwide, offering 36,500 products with quick delivery. 

Today, with over 6,000 employees in North America, Uline has distribution centers in Chicago, IL; Minneapolis, MN; Allentown, PA; Los Angeles, CA; Atlanta, GA; Dallas, TX and Seattle, WA. We also have international facilities in Toronto, Edmonton and Vancouver Canada, along with Mexicali and Monterrey Mexico.

Uline is a drug-free workplace.

name: Project Manager (PM3)
desc:
We’re Willis Towers Watson: a leading global advisory, broking and solutions company. Our people work together to influence every aspect of our clients’ businesses and push our industry forward. You can too. We design and deliver solutions that manage risk, optimize benefits, cultivate talent, and expand the power of capital to protect and strengthen institutions and individuals. Our unique perspective allows us to see the critical intersections between talent, assets and ideas — the dynamic formula that drives business performance. 

Learn more about our opportunities at careers.willistowerswatson.com

name: Software Development Engineer
desc:
From the start, the Fortinet vision has been to deliver broad, truly integrated, high-performance security across the IT infrastructure.

We provide top-rated network and content security, as well as secure access products that share intelligence and work together to form a cooperative fabric. Our unique security fabric combines purpose-built ASICs, an intuitive operating system, and applied threat intelligence to give you proven security, exceptional performance, and better visibility and control--while providing easier administration.

Our flagship enterprise firewall platform, FortiGate, is available in a wide range of sizes and form factors to fit any environment, and provides a broad array of next generation security and networking functions. Complementary products can be deployed with a FortiGate to enable a simplified, end-to-end security infrastructure.

name: Data Engineer - Senior Manager (Hadoop, Kafka, Cassandra, Spark, H2O, AWS)
desc:
Money influences everyone in some way, shape or form. At Capital One UK, it is our common purpose to ensure this influence is a positive one on our customers' lives.

We are an information based lending company, founded on the belief that technology and information could transform the industry. Still led by our founder with that vision, we are a successful global bank and one of the UK's top credit card providers supporting millions of customers. We continue to transform at pace and work at the forefront to bring the best to our customers and help them succeed.

Our transformation from financial services company to tech-led business makes us a pretty special place to work. We draw on the latest tech to achieve our purpose. We think it’s good to share too – be it collaborating on projects, expertise, insights or opinions. So we value everyone that works for us. 

Our team is relaxed, flexible and full of smart, driven people with heart who are working together to develop the next big things.

name: Business Process Analyst
desc:
From one teacher's pocket to 22 branches.

Thurston County Teachers Credit Union began in 1937. In 2006, a new name was unveiled: TwinStar Credit Union. Then, in 2009, TwinStar expanded its field of membership to include all residents in the state of Washington. In 2011, TwinStar Credit Union crossed the Columbia River and took our unique style of banking into Oregon. We now operate a branch in Wilsonville. And that’s the credit union you own today.

name: Product Manager I
desc:
Elevate’s innovative online credit solutions provide immediate relief to customers today and help them build a brighter financial future. The company’s products are more responsible and transparent and cost less than the alternatives available to the millions of consumers
not well served by traditional credit providers. Elevate is committed to rewarding borrowers’ good financial behavior with features like lower interest rates, free financial training, and free credit monitoring.

name: Product Marketing Manager, B2B-Technology
desc:
S37 is a mobile technology and clinical trials organization based in Los Angeles. We are focused on the development of networked patient-centric models for clinical research to rapidly accelerate biomedical discovery. We leverage partnerships with national mobile nursing companies, pharmacy chains, patient advocacy groups, virtual e-consenting, mobile devices, and other technology companies to maximize efficiency. Then, using design-thinking principles and rapid prototyping, S37 brings the best clinical trials right to the patient's homes. 

Our proprietary technology platform, NORA (Network-Oriented Research Assistant), bridges the gap between traditional trial management software and an advanced telemedicine platform to support all participants in Networked Clinical Trials. We utilize telemedicine, networked investigators, industry partnerships, proprietary software technologies, innovative patient engagement methods, industry-integrated software, and centralized regulatory processes.

name: Research Scientist (Compendial Program Owner, Analytical Outsourcing & Stability)
desc:
Advancing Therapeutics, Improving Lives

Gilead Sciences, Inc. is a research-based biopharmaceutical company that discovers, develops & commercializes innovative medicines in areas of unmet medical need. We strive to transform & simplify care for people with life-threatening illnesses worldwide. Gilead's portfolio of products & pipeline of investigational drugs includes treatments for HIV/AIDS, liver diseases, cancer, inflammatory & respiratory diseases & cardiovascular conditions.


Important: Gilead does not view this site as a forum for feedback on Gilead products. Where such comments are made information will be passed to our Drug Safety team who may be in contact where contact details are provided.

name: Software Applications Engineer
desc:
General Dynamics Land Systems is part of GD, a global aerospace and defense company. As a key operation in the Combat Systems group, Land Systems is a global leader in designing, manufacturing and modernizing the world’s most recognized land combat vehicles. We produce main battle tanks, tracked combat vehicles and light armored vehicles, as well as a broad range of high-performance weapons systems and munitions.

Land Systems delivers key ground-force machinery with powerful tracked and wheeled military vehicles needed to face sophisticated land forces. The Abrams main battle tank, the family of Stryker and LAV wheeled combat vehicles and the AJAX armoured fighting vehicles are at the center of Land Systems’ military vehicle platforms.

Our employees form the heart of our company. We empower their unique blend of skill and innovation to develop and produce the very best for our customers.

name: Production Applications Support Engineer II
desc: Since 1997, Advance America has helped millions of hardworking Americans with a variety of personalized financial solutions, including Payday Loans, Installment Loans, Title Loans, and Personal Lines of Credit. We are a nationally recognized, fully licensed financial company with over 1,900 locations nationwide and online lending services. As a founding member of the Community Financial Services Association, we believe our customers deserve clear, understandable loan terms, and therefore encourage fair and fully disclosed lending practices. So our customers can have confidence knowing they’ve made a smart choice with Advance America.

name: Lead Analyst, Data Management
desc: The E.W. Scripps Company (NASDAQ: SSP) serves audiences and businesses through a growing portfolio of local and national media brands. With 36 television stations, Scripps is one of the nation’s largest independent TV station owners. Scripps runs a collection of national journalism and content businesses, including Newsy, the next-generation national news network; podcast industry leader Stitcher; the fast-growing national broadcast networks Bounce, Grit, Escape and Laff; and Triton, the global leader in digital audio technology and measurement services. Scripps produces original programming including “Pickler & Ben,” runs an award-winning investigative reporting newsroom in Washington, D.C., and is the longtime steward of the Scripps National Spelling Bee. Founded in 1878, Scripps has held for decades to the motto, “Give light and the people will find their own way.”

name: Associate Research Manager, Google R+D for the Built Environment
desc:
We build to improve lives. 

Knowing that the work we do directly affects people, we commit to delivering a high quality end product with a collaborative construction process. The planning, collaboration, communication, and execution for each of our projects is focused on the success of the entire team, an approach that has earned us a network of excellent partners and a 93% client referral rate. Whether constructing office space, a laboratory, or a mission critical facility, we offer a practical approach built on a foundation of technical construction experience tailored to meet each project’s specific needs. 

Founded in 1992 and with offices in the Bay Area and Sacramento, California, XL is a contractor of choice for leading companies in technology, life sciences, healthcare, and education. XL is consistently ranked as one of the Best Places to Work by the San Francisco Business Times/Silicon Valley Business Journal and is a founding member of the United States Green Building Council (USGBC) Silicon Valley Chapter.

name: Program Manager - GPS
desc:
For over 35 years, Whitney, Bradley & Brown, Inc. (WBB) professionals have helped hundreds of clients successfully manage their most complex mission-critical business problems. By working closely with our clients, we are able to deliver sustainable, measurable results. Our focus is on providing the information our clients need to make an informed decision and take appropriate action. Our proven track record, unique products, innovative solutions, and world-class customer-focused methodologies guarantee the outcomes our clients seek.

Countless agencies and organizations confidently choose WBB for our knowledge, experience, insight, and guidance in addressing their concerns. We combine corporate intellectual capital, deep industry knowledge and thought leadership to deliver a variety of mission support activities, operational capabilities development, acquisition and program support and analytical solutions to the Defense, Homeland Security, Federal, Health and Commercial markets.

name: Product Marketing Manager
desc: Genscape wants to make sure that distributors, power marketers, regulators, utilities, and other energy market participants have the big picture about power supplies (the generation landscape), in real time. Some of the largest energy concerns in the US and Europe collaborated with Genscape to develop the company's information delivery system, which uses a network of remote, wireless devices on transmission grids to collect power supply information. This proprietary data is then delivered to customers through web-based interfaces and direct data feeds into customers' systems. The company is a subsidiary of DMG Information, the business information division of the Daily Mail and General Trust plc.

name: Data Analyst
desc:
Here at Envision, we have been growing in our expertise of IT recruiting for more than 30 years, delivering full-service IT recruiting services including contract, right to hire and permanent placement services.

Founded in 1983 and headquartered in St. Louis, MO with a branch office in Phoenix, AZ Envision has built a reputation for excellence among the large number of staffing companies present in the IT industry.

name: Composites Development Engineer
desc:
Headquartered in Morgan Hill, CA, the passionate and creative teammates at Specialized have designed and manufactured the world's most innovative bikes and gear since 1974. 

Founded on the principle of performance and fueled by innovation, our focus on the rider and their needs is our constant. From seasoned pros and weekend warriors, to kids and commuters—if you ride, we’re for you. The passion we have for sharing our love of bikes with the world can be seen in those who choose to work here.

We are over 1,500 teammates across more than 25 countries. We are Specialized.

name: Android Engineer
desc:
KeepTruckin is on a mission to modernize the trucking industry. With the leading fleet management platform, we are bringing trucks online and fundamentally changing the way freight is moved on our roads.

Listed in Forbes Cloud 100 and recognized by Glassdoor as a “Best Place to Work” in 2019, KeepTruckin shows the benefits of investing in talented employees.

We are looking for people from all backgrounds who want to make an impact on the millions of drivers who keep our world moving. Together, we work hard, snack harder, laugh a lot, collaborate nonstop, sing karaoke, and enjoy the happiest of hours. Headquartered in San Francisco, we have offices in Nashville, Buffalo, Pakistan, and Taiwan.

name: Data Analyst
desc:
Integrated Resources, Inc., is led by a seasoned team with combined decades in the industry. We deliver strategic workforce solutions that help you manage your talent and business more efficiently and effectively. Since launching in 1996, IRI has attracted, assembled and retained key employees who are experts in their fields. This has helped us expand into new sectors and steadily grow.

We’ve stayed true to our focus of finding qualified and experienced professionals in our specialty areas. Our partner-employers know that they can rely on us to find the right match between their needs and the abilities of our top-tier candidates. By continually exceeding their expectations, we have built successful ongoing partnerships that help us stay true to our commitments of performance and integrity.

name: Acquisition Marketing Manager
desc:
Wirecard is the global innovation leader in digital financial technology and one of the fastest growing tech companies in Europe. Together with our more than 5,500 employees, located in 28 countries worldwide, we develop forward-looking technologies and cutting-edge payment solutions. Wirecard AG is listed on the Frankfurt Stock Exchange (DAX and TecDAX).

As an international employer with a presence on every continent, we offer you a wide range of opportunities to further your personal and professional growth. Our outstanding team spirit, as well as the hands-on mentality of our employees, make Wirecard a truly unique company to work for. No matter which department or level you join: With us, you will have the chance to proactively transform the future of payment. 

This is why we are able to continually develop ― as individuals, as a team, as Wirecard.

name: Senior Business Systems Analyst - SAP TM
desc:
Chamberlain Group (CGI) is a global leader in access solutions and products. As the corporate parent company to LiftMaster, Chamberlain, Merlin and Grifco, we design and engineer residential garage door openers, commercial door operators and gate entry systems. Our products are connected through our innovative MyQ technology which empowers users to control or monitor their entry points through smartphone access. We give the power of access and knowledge.

CGI is also the parent company to Controlled Products Systems Group, the largest wholesale distributor of perimeter access control equipment in the U.S.

name: Big Data Engineer
desc:
We're at the forefront of delivering the next big thing every day. At Peraton, our fast-paced company responds rapidly to the world's evolving challenges, delivering bold, innovative solutions that protect and promote freedom around the world. 

As we move closer towards a safer and more secure future, our team of incredibly smart individuals is committed to Doing The
Can't Be Done. Are you?

name: Staff Software Applications Engineer
desc: Financial services can be complicated. At Charles Schwab, we’re trying to fix that. We have a history of challenging the status quo and innovating in ways that help individuals create a better tomorrow.

name: Data Scientist
desc:
Hunter International is a STEM-focused staffing agency, with openings in 21 states across the United States. 

Hunter International Recruiting is certified as a women’s business enterprise through the Women’s Business Enterprise National Council (WBENC), the nation’s largest third-party certifier of businesses owned and operated by women in the US.  We recognize the commitment to supplier diversity that is embraced by corporations and government agencies today, and we can add diversity to your supply chain.

name: Senior Software Engineer
desc:
As a team member here, you’re empowered to discover and deliver solutions that make life radically simple. Whether you’re helping our clients navigate the complicated home buying process or developing the latest game-changing financial products, you join an organization that is changing the face of lending – just as we have for more than 30 years.

	What started simply as a summer experiment for our founder and chairman Dan Gilbert has become America’s largest mortgage lender,1 with offices in Detroit, Cleveland, Phoenix, Charlotte and more. Today, more than 17,000 team members work for our suite of fintech services. Together with nearly 100 brands across a broad range of industries, from real estate to sports, we make up the Rock Family of Companies – all united by an obsession to find a better way for our clients, our team members and our communities.

	We say that we’re obsessed, but it’s more than that – it’s our purpose and guiding light. Finding a better way is the only way. The results speak for themselves:

•	We were the first lender to bring the entire mortgage process online.
•	For 9 years in a row now, J.D. Power has ranked Quicken Loans highest in the nation in customer satisfaction for Primary Mortgage Origination. And for the sixth year in a row, they also ranked us highest for Mortgage Servicing.
•	We build advanced technology that improves our clients’ lives, including voice assistant integrations that make it possible to pay your mortgage simply using your voice.

This success wouldn’t be possible without our team members. It’s because of their drive and determination that we’ve made the top-30 of FORTUNE magazine’s annual ranking of the 100 Best Companies to Work For list for 15 consecutive years. But awards can’t replace great ideas. That’s why we’re committed to an inclusive workplace, where every voice is heard and all our team members have access and opportunity to grow their skills and become the best versions of themselves.

That mission extends out beyond our walls and right into our communities, where we don’t just volunteer but also invest our unique efforts in ways that impact the world around us. 

We’ve revolutionized the mortgage industry, but this is about more than mortgages. This is about changing people’s lives. Join our team and change your own life today.


Based on Quicken Loans data in comparison to public data records.

For J.D. Power award information, visit JDPower.com.

name: Senior Business Analyst (Temporary)
desc: Putting kids first, since 1977. We are a global not-for-profit dedicated to helping kids live their dreams. Data is our tool -- gathered through our assessments, validated by research and brought to life by our 5000+ partners.

name: Big Data Analyst / Engineer
desc:
Affinity Solutions is the leader in precision marketing solutions, including: card-linked offer loyalty programs, customer acquisition and share shift campaign offerings, a comprehensive marketing platform for the small merchant, and a range of targeting, insight, and attribution solutions for marketers in retail, media, brands and beyond. 
 
Affinity leverages proprietary analytics, applied to a range of datasets including payment transactions data, in a privacy-controlled and regulations-compliant environment, to engage the right consumer at the right time and channel with the right message and offer, for its financial institution, retailer, media and advertising platform partners.
 
Affinity has partnerships with nearly 4,000 national and regional banks, and approximately 10,000 brick-and-mortar retailers. Its innovative programs drive deeper, longer lasting, and more valuable customer relationships for all of its partners. 
 
For more information, please visit www.affinitysolutions.com.

name: Statistician
desc: A $20 billion health care provider and insurer, Pittsburgh-based UPMC is inventing new models of patient-centered, cost-effective, accountable care. The largest nongovernmental employer in Pennsylvania, UPMC integrates 87,000 employees, 40 hospitals, 700 doctors’ offices and outpatient sites, and a more than 3.5 million-member Insurance Services Division, the largest medical insurer in western Pennsylvania. In the most recent fiscal year, UPMC contributed $1.2 billion in benefits to its communities, including more care to the region’s most vulnerable citizens than any other health care institution, and paid $587 million in federal, state, and local taxes. Working in close collaboration with the University of Pittsburgh Schools of the Health Sciences, UPMC shares its clinical, managerial, and technological skills worldwide through its innovation and commercialization arm, UPMC Enterprises, and through UPMC International. Most new co-workers start with 20 days PTO per year, 10 holidays per year,  6% 401k match with immediate vesting, semi-annual bonuses, and eligibility to participate in our Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).  We offer other great benefits, including up to $10,000 in annual tuition reimbursement and an zero dollar deductible BCBS health insurance.

name: Clinical Scientist Director
desc:
Jounce Therapeutics, Inc. is a clinical-stage immunotherapy company dedicated to transforming the treatment of cancer by developing therapies that enable the immune system to attack tumors and provide long lasting benefits to patients through a biomarker-driven approach. Through the use of its Translational Science Platform, Jounce first focuses on specific cell types within the human tumor microenvironment to prioritize targets, and then identifies related biomarkers designed to match the right immunotherapy to the right patient. Jounce is developing two clinical-stage programs as well as advancing and building out its broad and wholly-owned discovery pipeline of immuno-oncology targets, including those expressed on T-regulatory cells, macrophages and stromal cells. Jounce’s lead product candidate, vopratelimab, is a monoclonal antibody that binds to and activates ICOS and is currently being assessed in a Phase 2 clinical trial. JTX-4014 is a PD-1 inhibitor intended for use in combination with future pipeline products, and Jounce has completed enrollment in the JTX-4014 Phase 1 clinical trial. In addition, Jounce has exclusively licensed worldwide rights to JTX-8064, a LILRB2 receptor antagonist, to Celgene. For more information, please visit www.jouncetx.com.

We have many career opportunities at Jounce and are looking for exceptional individuals who share our passion and perseverance for developing highly durable cancer immunotherapies that can dramatically impact and improve patients’ lives.

By using our deep understanding of data and building services that make having a car less expensive, more convenient, and smarter, we aim to make the urban car experience truly simple. And for some, we hope to make car ownership a possibility where it wasn’t before.

Attracting, retaining and developing a diverse team of professionals lies at the heart of RSM's commitment to its people. We strive to create an inclusive workplace that celebrates the differences among our employees, while encouraging them to embrace ownership of their work and personal lives.

Atlantic Union Bank is also proud to be recognized as a leader in the banking industry, winning a 2019 JD Power Award for #1 in Customer Satisfaction with Retail Banking in the Mid-Atlantic Region, and being named to 2019 list of Best-in-State Banks by Forbes Magazine.

Member FDIC | Equal Housing Lender

This way, every organization who uses Cornerstone can realize their modern workforce’s potential, and every individual can bring their potential to life.   
We're always on the lookout for new, curious and capable people who can help us achieve our goal. So if you want to work for a friendly, global and innovative company let us know!

eSolutions strengthens providers’ revenue health so they can focus on what really matters—exceptional care and operational excellence. Thousands of providers count on eSolutions’ RCM solutions paired with actionable data insights to improve efficiencies, minimize denials and shorten time to revenue.

In today’s complex healthcare environment, managing revenue is more important than ever. eSolutions gives healthcare providers the confidence to manage their revenue cycle. Our best-in-class Medicare and Multi-Payer revenue cycle management, workflow automation and data analytics tools give providers unparalleled transparency that helps them get paid quickly and accurately.

name: Software Engineer
desc:
Long-time friends, Brandon Cruz and Clint Jones, were shopping for health insurance after college. Finding coverage – and understanding how to use it – proved to be anything but simple. They faced mountains of paperwork, confusing health insurance terminology, and astronomical prices. At one point, they turned to each other and said, “There has to be better way.”

So, in 2001, they set out to find that better way. Brandon and Clint founded GoHealth, a company that revolutionized the health insurance shopping process – and the health care industry as a whole. While the future of the health care industry is ever-changing, our focus and determination has remained razor-sharp. As our customers evolve, as their needs continue to change and adjust, so does GoHealth.

Everyone who is a part of GoHealth understands the importance of what we do every day. We’re here for Americans, we understand their needs, and we work harder to get them what they deserve.

Our commitment to this industry goes hand-in-hand with the committed relationship we have to with our employees. The industry specific knowledge base of our employees differentiates us as world-class company and global software business.

That’s where we come in – over $4B in new construction is facilitated through our network every day. Whether it’s a remodel of your local coffee shop, or building the new Warriors Stadium, we enable collaboration between the companies that make these projects happen. We've made it easy to find, communicate, share documents, bid, and analyze data in this historically manual, labor-intensive process.

Most importantly, though, we offer our patients a medical home: a place where they can come for all of their needs; a place where the doctors and nurses know them by their first name.  We want to help our patients get all of the health care they need -- when they need it -- in order to stay well.

Welcome to Clinica. Welcome home.

Trusted by the globe’s leading brands, covering 18 of the top 20 Fortune 100, all 10 of the top 10 healthcare and 10/10 of the top CPG companies. We are looking for people from all backgrounds who want to make an impact on the millions of drivers who keep our world moving. Together, we work hard, snack harder, laugh a lot, collaborate nonstop, sing karaoke, and enjoy the happiest of hours. Headquartered in San Francisco, we have offices in Nashville, Buffalo, Pakistan, and Taiwan.

Arthrex is a global medical device company and a leader in new product development and medical education in orthopedics. desc:
Money influences everyone in some way, shape or form. At Capital One UK, it is our common purpose to ensure this influence is a positive one on our customers' lives.

We are an information based lending company, founded on the belief that technology and information could transform the industry. Still led by our founder with that vision, we are a successful global bank and one of the UK's top credit card providers supporting millions of customers. We continue to transform at pace and work at the forefront to bring the best to our customers and help them succeed.

Our transformation from financial services company to tech-led business makes us a pretty special place to work. We draw on the latest tech to achieve our purpose. We think it’s good to share too – be it collaborating on projects, expertise, insights or opinions. So we value everyone that works for us. 

Our team is relaxed, flexible and full of smart, driven people with heart who are working together to develop the next big things.

desc:
Passion for technology drives us here at Neudesic. But it’s innovation that defines us. From design to development and support to management, Neudesic offers decades of experience, proven frameworks and a disciplined approach to quickly deliver reliable, quality solutions that help you go to market faster and get a leg up on your competition.

-Leverage the Cloud to reduce costs and increase flexibility
-Process and analyze Big Data faster to improve decision making
-Expand market reach with enterprise-ready mobile solutions
-Integrate systems and applications to enhance productivity
-Monetize APIs and other digital assets to boost revenue

Neudesic’s continued success is built on a group of amazing, talented people who share the same values of Passion, Discipline, Innovation, Teaming and Integrity – which is a direct reflection of Neudesic recently being recognized by Microsoft as the U.S. Partner of the Year for 2017.

name: Data Analyst
desc: Founded in 1907, the American Association for Cancer Research (AACR) is the world’s first and largest professional organization dedicated to advancing cancer research and its mission to prevent and cure cancer. AACR membership includes more than 40,000 laboratory, translational, and clinical researchers; population scientists; other health care professionals; and patient advocates residing in 120 countries. The AACR marshals the full spectrum of expertise of the cancer community to accelerate progress in the prevention, biology, diagnosis, and treatment of cancer by annually convening more than 30 conferences and educational workshops, the largest of which is the AACR Annual Meeting with more than 21,900 attendees.

name: Senior SAP FICO Project Manager
desc:
When people are celebrated for being who they are, when their unique qualities are valued and respected, they feel encouraged to take chances and grow as individuals. This is the feeling Liberty Mutual is dedicated to bringing to its people.
We would not be where we are today—a 1912-founded global leader in property and casualty insurance—without our people. That’s why we’re passionate about protecting the lives and dreams of not only our customers, but our employees. While they number in the thousands, we know each one is an individual with a distinct personality, irreplaceable passions and skills, and a singular drive to help others.
Whether its offering stability in a role that fits you, giving you the opportunity to try new things, offering the chance to work for an evolving company with a deep sense of humanity and commitment to diversity and philanthropy—or simply encouraging you to be yourself—we want you to come make a difference with us.

name: Senior Statistician
desc:
WuXi AppTec is a leading global biopharmaceutical outsourcing company with operations in China and US. 

As an innovation-driven and customer-focused company, WuXi AppTec provides a broad and integrated portfolio of services throughout the research, development, manufacturing, and regulatory process. Our services are designed to help our customers worldwide, by shortening discovery and development time and lowering the expense of R&D through cost-effective and efficient outsourcing solutions. 

Evolving from four founders and a single laboratory in December 2000 to over 10,000 employees and 5.5 million square feet of facility space across 23 campuses in the U.S. and China today, WuXi AppTec is building an alternative R&D engine to serve the worldwide life-science industry, and providing our clients with unprecedented access to global and emerging markets.

We are an EOE - W/M/D/V

name: Data Analyst
desc:
Course Hero is an online learning platform where you can access over 25 million course-specific study resources contributed by a community of students and educators. You’ll find practice problems, study guides, videos, class notes, and step-by-step explanations for every subject you’re studying — from economics to literature, biology to history, accounting to psychology, and everything in between.

On Course Hero, it’s easy and quick to find the resources you need to complement what you’re learning in the classroom. You’ll get guidance to help you take on the toughest assignments, gain a deeper understanding of core concepts, and study for exams for your courses at your school. When you study with Course Hero, you’re prepared to tackle any class with confidence.

name: Senior Database Engineer
desc: Clover (a First Data company) empowers small businesses to run and grow their businesses. Our products are changing the consumer/merchant experience for the better, opening avenues for seamless customer-merchant interactions. Come join us in our extraordinary workspace in Sunnyvale, CA. We're steps from Caltrain and old downtown Sunnyvale. Come visit us at http://www.clover.com/jobs to see our openings and join our team!

name: Product Manager
desc:
We're the world's leading connected carsharing platform, on a mission toward empowering people to carshare everywhere. We developed and built the Connect®, the world's first connected device for carsharing, which allows users to rent, find, and unlock Getaround cars using the Getaround app. 

Founded in 2009, we are currently in 300 cities and 7 countries with 5 million users and 1000+ car models. Want to solve real-world problems, create an amazing consumer experience, and change the future of transportation?

Accelerate your career and join us.

name: Associate Data Analyst
desc:
Cross-platform measurement is necessary when making informed business decisions in an increasingly complex media environment. We help leading media properties, brands, and advertisers connect the dots to grow their businesses.

Comscore is the trusted currency for planning, transacting, and evaluating media across platforms.

name: Data Scientist
desc:
NuWave delivers Analytics and Data Management solutions to customers in public sector markets. We focus on making our customers successful. Our success comes through theirs.

NuWave was founded with four major goals in mind:

1. Deliver leading edge technology solutions with a 100% success rate

It is no mistake that our number one goal is making our customers successful. Our philosophy is our success, at the individual, project, or company level,, coes only through making every customer successful on every engagement - with no exceptions and no excuses.

2. Maintain a family-oriented culture where employees enjoy coming to work

At NuWave, we believe strongly that people work best if they like the environment they work in, which to us means an environment that nurtures trust, respect, growth, and encouragement. Our core values of ethics, discipline, teamwork, initiative, accountability, and quality serve as a foundation for what we expect from one anohter, and what our customers can expect from us.

3. Value technology leaders equally with management leaders

NuWave was founded in 1999 by technology innovators who thrive on providing cutting edge solutions to solve complex business problems. This has not changed, and continues to be a core goal as we continue to seek ways to stay ahead of the curve with technology solutions to help our customers. We invest heavily in researching bet of breed products and best practices for solution development and delivery in order to provide our customers with the best value and competitive advantage.

4. Give back to the communities we live and work in

At NuWave we believe our success would not be possible without strong local, state and national communities. This drives us to contribute a portion of what we achieve through our success to the communities we part of. We are very active in charities such as Operation Renewed Hope Foundation (Supporting homeless veterans), Lungevity (Lung Cancer), Mission of Mercy (Mobile Healthcare Clinic), and Dranesville, VA Elementary School (Christmas Presents for children in low-income households)

name: Senior Actuarial Analyst
desc: California Casualty is more than a century-old, privately held, policyholder owned company offering customized auto and home insurance products for educators, law enforcement, nurses and firefighters – those who protect, strengthen and enhance the quality of life in communities across America.  Since we pioneered the industry trend in 1951, we’ve marketed our business through strong affinity group partnerships.  We don’t sell to the general public.  Our personalized coverage, competitive pricing, and exceptional, gold-standard service have helped us grow to serve more than 100 affinity groups across the nation and their members – the folks we think of as everyday American heroes.  We strive to earn our customers' trust each day and give them the best possible service.

name: Data Analyst

name: Software Engineer

TechSmith helps you create high-quality images and videos for better communication.
 
We’re all wired to process visuals faster and more effectively than words alone. And it’s hard to make sure people always understand. That's why we've spent the last 30 years building market- leading screen capture, screen recording, and video creation software that helps people create visuals in order to communicate better.
 
Whether it's using a screenshot to reduce the wordiness of an email or creating a series of tutorial videos, we've helped more than 30 million users worldwide create visuals that share information in a faster, more engaging way.

Tower Hill has recently expanded our commercial products to Alabama and South Carolina and residential products to Ohio. Within the next few years, as a regional carrier, Tower Hill plans to offer its products in 15 states.

As a financially solid company poised for continued growth, Tower Hill offers considerable opportunities for career advancement and provides competitive benefits to our employees. name: Technical Data Analyst
desc:
At Arcadia.io, our goal is to improve population health – it’s what motivates us every day. Lastline’s open architecture integrates advanced threat defenses and intelligence into existing operational workflows and security systems. Lastline's technology correlates network and object analysis to achieve timely breach confirmation and incident response.

This distinctive technology also eliminates the major source of the feedback, or "whistling," commonly experienced with conventional hearing aids. The novel technology received FDA De Novo approval in 2015 and has been in market ever since.

Through our app, patients receive reminders to take their medication, personalized weather forecasts, health tips and more. We’re used by 70,000 patients across 16 countries and have been proven to impact the use of rescue medication, hospitalizations, ER visits and overall level of control for asthma and COPD.

name: Principal Research Associate, Potency Assay Development
desc:
At Moderna, we believe messenger RNA, or mRNA, is the “software of life.”  
Every cell in the body uses mRNA to provide real-time instructions to make the proteins necessary to drive all aspects of biology, including in human health and disease.  Given its essential role, we believe mRNA could be used to create a new category of medicines with significant potential to improve the lives of patients.

We are pioneering a new class of medicines made of messenger RNA, or mRNA. The potential implications of using mRNA as a drug are significant and far-reaching and could meaningfully improve how medicines are discovered, developed and manufactured. 

Since our founding in 2010, we have worked to build the industry's leading mRNA technology platform, the infrastructure to accelerate drug discovery and early development, a rapidly expanding pipeline, and a world-class team. Our pipeline includes development candidates for mRNA-based vaccines and therapies spanning several therapeutic areas, and we have multiple clinical trials underway with other development candidates progressing toward the clinic. In addition, we have numerous discovery programs advancing toward development.
